channel.title: Suggestions and Ideas
channel.description: Post your game Suggestions and Ideas here!

item.title: Safezone
item.author: invalid@example.com (ZeroincSi)
item.dc:creator: ZeroincSi
item.content:encoded:
This is my Idea but maybe it will be useful for players
-Maps & GPS to show the location where you are and safezone
-Warp point to safezone
-More safezone and more NPC settlement for trading
-Building and fortification

item.title: MPT is love, MPT is best, but scotteh and staff members are best too <3
item.author: invalid@example.com (BarisDaNub)

item.content:encoded:
Scotteh u should remove MPT from loot and u should add it to Black Market Dealer or Heavy Guns Dealer.
Cause MPT is a good gun and its a good gun.
Scotteh, i know ur best and ur good but MPT is good too.

item.title: Helicopters
item.author: invalid@example.com (fALOR1717)
item.dc:creator: fALOR1717
item.content:encoded:
Dear Admins

Hey so i am an old clan leader i used to love making an army and airdropping it into a position and also using it as a show of force of my army but now there are none. So i am hoping they might get re added but might be fuel hungry so they aren't overpowered.


Thanks,
Falor

item.title: Here are ideas I have for Decimation
item.author: invalid@example.com (Takazaki)
item.dc:creator: Takazaki
item.content:encoded:
Hello,​

Before starting the topic, I have a detail to bring : I'm French. So, please don't be strict with me if I speak English not very well. Thanks.

I like play in this apocalyptic Minecraft server so much. However, I found many details that can be improved or simply added to Decimation and its servers. Here are my ideas...

Here are ideas I have for Decimation

item.title: What I personally think should be added to Decimation.
item.author: invalid@example.com (MamedTeumessian)
item.dc:creator: MamedTeumessian
item.content:encoded:
Hello there faithful person reading this, my name is MamedTeumessian, and I think the developers could make this mod feel and work a bit better.

First things I think you should add are more uses for crafting, plus branch out for food so that you have empty cans that are specific to what they are before, but can still be used to make Water in a Can or Bottled Water. Overall there should also be more reasons to eat food or drink some water, as there should be two new things that I...

What I personally think should be added to Decimation.

item.title: Trading with other players + weapon ideas
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wfox7)
item.dc:creator: Wfox7
item.content:encoded:
Maybe you guys can make or just use a trading plugin,where we can trade safely each other (item for item, item for money).
Weapon ideas:
- Karabiner 98k(price weapon: ~700 , price ammo: ~50/mag , ammo/mag: 10 cal:7.62x54mmR, buyable at blackmarket)
- Scar rifles (price weapon: 680 , price ammo: 50/mag , ammo/mag: 30, buyable at blackmarket)
- Barrett 50.cal(1 shot enemy,price weapon: ~1000 , price ammo: ~150/mag ...

Trading with other players + weapon ideas
